question: 景観
sourceMnemonic: Quite the <kanji>scene</kanji>, this <kanji>view</kanji> is. What you're looking at is called <vocabulary>scenery</vocabulary>. And, in fact, it's a <vocabulary>spectacular view</vocabulary>!
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
